div.p: Enriching Scholars Grades K-12

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Schools Adapting to COV-19: Phalen Academies to Launch E-Learning Platforms at Its 22 Schools Across the Country

div.p: Despite the challenges the COVID-19 pandemic has posed, we are determined to continue to meet the unique needs of each scholar in each of our schools. Support our scholars as they strive to maintain learning gains.

a.title: Go to comments for Schools Adapting to COV-19: Phalen Academies to Launch E-Learning Platforms at Its 22 Schools Across the Country

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman

a.span: UPDATE: Indiana Governor Mandates All Schools Close Through May 1

div.p: Indiana Governor Eric Holcomb announced that all Indiana schools will be closed until at least May 1, 2020. Additionally, all state-mandated tests have been canceled for the current academic year. The PLA team is doing everything possible to ensure that our scholars continue receiving meals and maintain their learning during the mandated school closures. Please continue to check your school’s website and social media for the latest updates.

a.title: Go to comments for UPDATE: Indiana Governor Mandates All Schools Close Through May 1

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at TBLA

a.span: Gary Community School Corporation Offers Meal Distribution for All Gary Children

div.p: The Gary Community School Corporation has instituted a breakfast and lunch meal program for all Gary community members age 18 or under. Click the headline above to learn more about the program and meal distribution dates.

a.title: Go to comments for Gary Community School Corporation Offers Meal Distribution for All Gary Children

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman

a.span: Boys Basketball State Tournaments to Continue with Limited to No Spectators

div.p: IHSSA held a press conference this morning in regard to boys' basketball sectionals and the ongoing coronavirus pandemic. It was determined that spectators for the game will be limited to essential staff, players and immediate family ONLY. Click the headline above to see the full press release from IHSAA and instructions on basketball ticket refunds.

a.title: Go to comments for Boys Basketball State Tournaments to Continue with Limited to No Spectators

img.alt: PLA Monitoring of the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)

a.span: PLA Monitoring of the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)

div.p: PLA is working to monitor the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) and will work to share updates as we learn more.

a.title: Go to comments for PLA Monitoring of the Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19)

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy Jacques WIlliams

a.span: Fan Votes Move TBLA’s Jacques Williams to the #DreamFearlessly Slam Dunk Championship Semifinals

div.p: Fans can vote once per day, per device for Jacques during the semifinals starting February 27 at 12 p.m. CST until 12 p.m. CST March 5 at Amfam.com/FanVote.

a.title: Go to comments for Fan Votes Move TBLA’s Jacques Williams to the #DreamFearlessly Slam Dunk Championship Semifinals

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

a.span: One Site. One Purpose. Thea Bowman Leadership Academies to Combine K-12

div.p: Next school year by combining resources, TBLA scholars will have access to more quality facilities, more quality programming, and additional extracurricular and academic supports to ensure a successful school year and beyond.

a.title: Go to comments for One Site. One Purpose. Thea Bowman Leadership Academies to Combine K-12

img.alt: TBLA Scholars Experience a Day in the Life of an Indiana Senator

a.span: TBLA Scholars Experience a Day in the Life of an Indiana Senator

div.p: Our scholars recently traveled to the Indiana Senate House to watch our government in action! Thank you to The Links, Incorporated and Senator Eddie Melton for providing our scholars a first hand look at the legislative process.

a.title: Go to comments for TBLA Scholars Experience a Day in the Life of an Indiana Senator

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

a.span: One Site. One Purpose. Thea Bowman Leadership Academies' Board to Consider Combining K-12

div.p: If approved during the February 26th board meeting, TBLA Elementary scholars would leave their old building (on 6th Avenue) and move into Thea Bowman’s newest and largest facility located down the road at 3401 W 5th Avenue in Gary.

a.title: Go to comments for One Site. One Purpose. Thea Bowman Leadership Academies' Board to Consider Combining K-12

img.alt: Vote Today to Help Gary Scholar Enter the High School Dunkers and Shooters Competition During Final Four Weekend.

a.span: Vote Today to Help Gary Scholar Enter the High School Dunkers and Shooters Competition During Final Four Weekend.

div.p: Help us to send our TBLA Scholar to the Dunk Contest! Vote today and Every day Feb 11-Feb 18th!

a.title: Go to comments for Vote Today to Help Gary Scholar Enter the High School Dunkers and Shooters Competition During Final Four Weekend.

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

div.p: Follow scholar Camron W.Rogers on his journey through China.

a.title: Go to comments for TBLA Scholar Journeys through China

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

a.span: TBLA Congratulates Christian Haggard for Outstanding Achievements

div.p: During her high school career at TBLA, Christian scored over 1,000 points, made over 500 rebounds, 30 steals, and 200 assist. TBLA celebrates her achievements!

a.title: Go to comments for TBLA Congratulates Christian Haggard for Outstanding Achievements

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman

a.span: Chicago Tribune: TBLA Scholar a Champion on the Field and in the Classroom

div.p: It all started with a prayer for Isaiah Harris. Now in his junior year at Thea Bowman, Harris has everything he ever hoped and prayed for: a loving father and coach, and a shot at his dream to be the first in his family to go to college. After being named "the best linebacker of the Chicagoland region", Harris was invited to play for the USA National Football Team.

a.title: Go to comments for Chicago Tribune: TBLA Scholar a Champion on the Field and in the Classroom

img.alt: Our Senior Guard Jacques Williams is Flying High for Bowman

a.span: Our Senior Guard Jacques Williams is Flying High for Bowman

div.p: Bowman senior guard Jacques Williams is averaging 18.9 points and nine rebounds this season. (Mike Hutton / Post-Tribune)

a.title: Go to comments for Our Senior Guard Jacques Williams is Flying High for Bowman

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Please Join us for the PTSA/PTCA Meeting on Jan. 22nd

div.p: Please join us for our PTSA/PTCA Meeting. This meeting is open to all elementary and Jr/Sr. high school parents/guardians, and stakeholders. The meeting with be held at the Jr/Sr High School.

a.title: Go to comments for Please Join us for the PTSA/PTCA Meeting on Jan. 22nd

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

a.span: Staff Development for Thea Bowman Leadership Academies (K-12) Rescheduled for Feb 11th!

div.p: Attention TBLA K-12 Staff: Thank you for all that you do! This is a notice that professional development (PD) has been rescheduled for both elementary and high school stafff.

a.title: Go to comments for Staff Development for Thea Bowman Leadership Academies (K-12) Rescheduled for Feb 11th!

img.alt: Thea Bowman MS/HS Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

a.span: Thea Bowman MS/HS Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

div.p: With over two decades of experience in education, Mrs. Lang is very passionate about educating our youth and young adults. Her ultimate goal is to help create a pathway through high school and a post-secondary plan to college, military service and/or a career.

a.title: Go to comments for Thea Bowman MS/HS Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

img.alt: Thea Bowman ES Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

a.span: Thea Bowman ES Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

div.p: Mrs. Johnson is no stranger to our community. She has been with us for over a decade serving our school, scholars and families. We are thrilled that she is taking on this new leadership role expanding her support, spreading her love for our scholars, and helping to lead our elementary school forward.

a.title: Go to comments for Thea Bowman ES Welcomes New Assistant Principal!

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman

a.span: #OurScholarsSoar Thea Bowman Senior Already Makes Play of the Year!

div.p: By NWI Times. On New Year’s Day, Bowman senior Jacques Williams may have already provided the play of the year.

a.title: Go to comments for #OurScholarsSoar Thea Bowman Senior Already Makes Play of the Year!

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at TBLA

div.p: Oh! The places they will go! TBLA is now enrolling Kindergarten. Scholars must be age 5 by Sept. 1st. Download our kinder readiness brochure today!

a.title: Go to comments for TBLA Now Enrolling Kindergarten

img.alt: Thea Bowman Principal MS/HS

a.span: Please join us for Our Principal Meet & Greet Dec. 19th!

div.p: Please join us for our MS/HS Principal Meet and Greet. Our parents are our greatest partners. Get to know school leadership and share your goals as a parent.

a.title: Go to comments for Please join us for Our Principal Meet & Greet Dec. 19th!

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman ES

img.alt: Phalen Leadership Academies at Thea Bowman ES

a.span: Thea Bowman ES Scholars Participate in Junior Achievement Day

div.p: Scholars at Thea Bowman ES spend the day learning work-readiness, entrepreneurship and financial literacy skills with the help of educators, community volunteers, and Junior Achievement representatives.

a.title: Go to comments for Thea Bowman ES Scholars Participate in Junior Achievement Day

img.alt: Thea Bowman Phalen Leadership Academies

a.span: TBLA Middle School Welcomes Ms. Simmons as New Principal

div.p: In this expanded role, Mrs. Simmons will support scholars and families at both Thea Bowman campuses from kindergarten all the way through 8th grade. This provides more synergy in preparing our elementary scholars for middle and high school, and helps us to align more resources for our schools and scholars to support growth in their academic achievement.

a.title: Go to comments for TBLA Middle School Welcomes Ms. Simmons as New Principal

div.p: This Falls conferences will be held on Thursday, November 14th from 2:30 -4:30 and 5:30-7:30pm.

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academies Middle/High Registration

a.span: Join Us For Our Middle/High School Registration and Orientation!

div.p: Welcome to the 2019-2020 school year at Thea Bowman Leadership Academy! We have three upcoming dates where you'll have a chance to register for class and meet with teachers and other administration.

a.title: Go to comments for Join Us For Our Middle/High School Registration and Orientation!

img.alt: Congratulations Thea Bowman Varsity Volleyball Team

div.p: The Lady Eagles have earned the prestigious 2018-2019 American Volleyball Coach Association (AVCA) Team Academic Award! Congratulations ladies!

a.title: Go to comments for Congratulations TBLA Varsity Volleyball Team!

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Welcome Back! It's Almost Time For A New School Year.

div.p: Monday, August 12, 2019 begins the start of a new school year! If you haven't already, visit our enrollment page to get enrolled!

a.title: Go to comments for Welcome Back! It's Almost Time For A New School Year.

img.alt: Senior Pictures At Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Save The Date! It's Almost Time For Senior Pictures.

div.p: Come out and have your cap and gown senior pictures taken on August 17, 2019 starting at 10am.

a.title: Go to comments for Save The Date! It's Almost Time For Senior Pictures.

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Getting Thea Bowman Scholars College and Career Ready! Over 70% of TBLA Seniors Complete Scholar Success Program

div.p: “It is extremely important for us to do all that we can to prepare our scholars for life beyond the walls of Thea Bowman Leadership Academy," said a TBLA Principal, Keith Bradford. “We work really hard to create unique experiences and opportunities that help them to excel and thrive. We want them to prepare and learn today, so that they will lead tomorrow.”

a.title: Go to comments for Getting Thea Bowman Scholars College and Career Ready! Over 70% of TBLA Seniors Complete Scholar Success Program

img.alt: Back To School Game Day At Thea Bowman Leadership Academies

a.span: Game On! Join Us For Our Back To School Game Day!

div.p: Come out on July 19, 2019 from 1:00pm-5:00pm for a day of fun. There will be refreshments, video games, raffles, registration and so much more! From K-12, everyone is invited!

a.title: Go to comments for Game On! Join Us For Our Back To School Game Day!

a.span: Scholars Shine at National Agriculture Conference: Presenting Research on Soil Microbes and Human Health

div.p: Thea Bowman scholars presented research on soil microbes and their significance in plant and human health alongside undergraduate students, graduate students and industry professionals.

a.title: Go to comments for Scholars Shine at National Agriculture Conference: Presenting Research on Soil Microbes and Human Health

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy

a.span: Congratulations! Thea Bowman Middle and High School Scholars Win Big at Rainbow PUSH’s Oratorical Competition

div.p: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy scholars recently competed in an oratorical competition hosted at the Rainbow PUSH Coalition Headquarters in Chicago. Scholars grades 7-12 competed against students from Detroit and the Chicagoland area. They took home first place, second place, and honorable mention.

a.title: Go to comments for Congratulations! Thea Bowman Middle and High School Scholars Win Big at Rainbow PUSH’s Oratorical Competition

img.alt: Thea Bowman Leadership Academy Robotics Team

a.span: Congratulations! Scholars Win 1st Place in Regional STEM Competition: Will Now Present on a Global Scale

div.p: The elementary team will now go on to present their viable solution in the 2019 MATE International ROV Competition in June in Kingsport, Tennessee with other scholars from around the globe.

a.title: Go to comments for Congratulations! Scholars Win 1st Place in Regional STEM Competition: Will Now Present on a Global Scale

img.alt: A Message from Thea Bowman's Board Chair

a.span: Creating a Shared Vision: A Message from Thea Bowman's Board Chair

div.p: It is a great time to be a part of Thea Bowman Leadership Academy. There are many dedicated leaders, teachers, parents, and scholars that are working to help push Thea Bowman so that we continue to thrive and achieve—with the ultimate goal of offering the absolute best for our scholars.

section.h2: You're online. We're online. Let's connect.

div.p:
Elementary School
Call: 219-883-4826
975 W. 6th Avenue
Gary, IN 46402
Middle/High School
Call: 219-944-3100
3401 W 5th Avenue
Gary, IN 46402
Fax:

div.span: The McKinney-Vento Act protects scholars from discrimination based on their lack of a permanent residence. Homeless Scholars are eligible to receive a variety of services including: transportation services, free meals under the school nutrition programs, limited English proficiency class, gifted and talented programs, and special education services based on a scholar’s eligibility. Homeless Scholars will not be denied enrollment based on lack of proof of residency. Please consult the McKinney-Vento Act Liaison if you need assistance. The PLA Network does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, disability or national origin in any employment and/or educational opportunity. No person shall be excluded from participation in, denied the benefits of, or otherwise subjected to unlawful discrimination in any program or activity for which the PLA Network Board is responsible or for which it receives financial assistance from the U.S. Department of Education. The PLA Network values diversity.
